item.title: KOS
item.description: score:99 Chances: Kosmos Energy has a strong asset base with production in key regions like Ghana, Equatorial Guinea, and the U.S. Gulf of Mexico, as well as a gas development project in Mauritania and Senegal. The company maintains a sustainable exploration program which includes proven basin infrastructure-led exploration, emerging basins, and frontier basins, providing ample opportunities for growth.
